lejos.hardware.port
Interface Port

All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteNXTPort, RemotePort
public interface Port

Interface that provides a binding between a physical port and the different types of sensor interfaces that can be used with it

Author:
andy

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getName()
          return the string name used to reference this physical port
 int getPortType()
          Get the type classification for the port.
 int getSensorType()
          This function returns information on the sensor that is attached to the specified port.
<T extends IOPort>
T
open(java.lang.Class<T> portclass)
          Obtain access to a class that can be used to talk to the port hardware
 

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
return the string name used to reference this physical port

Returns:
a string representation of the port

open

<T extends IOPort> T open(java.lang.Class<T> portclass)
Obtain access to a class that can be used to talk to the port hardware

Parameters:
portclass - the required port interface
Returns:
a class that implements the requested interface

getPortType

int getPortType()
Get the type classification for the port. If a sensor is attached to the port this will identify the connection type (UART/IIC/Analog, etc.). Note that not platforms may be able to support this method.

Returns:
The type of the port.

getSensorType

int getSensorType()
This function returns information on the sensor that is attached to the specified port. Note that only very basic sensor identification information may be available for some sensor types. It may be necessary to actually open the sensor to allow it to be identified in further detail.

Returns:
the sensor type
